name: Viplus
description: Viplus is a blockchain technological product specifically designed to be as a lifetime free gift to the community using Vietsmile social network. The cryptocurrency market offers many superiorities and breakthroughs but also carries risks due to price fluctuations and short-term projects. With the goal of connecting the digital environment to the real world safely and transparently by the highly skillful founding team with many years of experience in financial environment. Viplus is a stable coin created from open source on multiple platforms such as ERC20, TRC20 and Binance Smart Chain. Viplus means a product applied in the transaction between digital and real environments. Users therefore will be able to exchange, store, save and use for other open platforms of the Vietsmile ecosystem. Viplus’s highlights: — No ICO — No staking. — No lending. — No MLM. Vietsmile has a large community user with millions of regular members and is a diverse and rocketing business platform. Viplus can be used to exchange goods, souvenirs, and advertisements on the social networking Vietsmile. The next simple step to attain this is to join our social networking community without investing any money. This is a special and limited gift for registered members only.
